name: Dragon Balls
description:
DRAGON BALLS: #kidsjam

Best played with an Xbox 360 gamepad

Dragon Balls is from the mind of my 7 year old son Boudi who came up with the concept, features and mechanics, did all the art and chose the SFX, music and font (I just coded it all together).

According to Boudi: "It's about a dragon stuck on an island and you have to jump over the poison balls and get as much money as you can."

You can watch a short playlist that documents Boudi's experience coming up with and creating his game, >>HERE<<

Please Tweet your scores, Boudi will love it!

I'm really impressed with Boudi's game! He had a lot of great ideas and although content wise it's a very simple game, it's really challenging and a lot of fun to play. I had a great time coding it all together for him and in doing so even learned a few more things.

Dragon Balls was made in Gamemaker Studio, with Boudi putting in about 5 hours of work to design the game, draw all of the art and play test it and myself putting in about 12 hours of work to code it all together (badly).
